about_the_game:
The Last Sovereign is an adult fantasy RPG that plunges you into the saga of a world torn between forces of lust and purity. As you enter the complex conflict, you forge a new path that will change the course of history!

...maybe. The thing is, acting like most heroes gets you killed, and most evil overlords' plans make no sense. The Last Sovereign is a game that twists your expectations for adult games, while fully embracing a reconstruction of some familiar old tropes to provide a lot of fun, sexy content.

By telling a story that has sex as an integral component, The Last Sovereign offers a deep storyline that naturally includes sex scenes. No need to grind for hours or lose to every enemy to find the content. Not only will you adventure in a world where sex is a weapon, you'll build a harem of fully-realized characters with their own reasons for being with you... in and out of the bedroom.

Features

  • Over 50 hours of gameplay.

  • No grinding or random battles: finite enemies visible on map.

  • Over 250 sex scenes, currently being illustrated.

  • Over 150 fully illustrated scenes, including over 1000 images total.

  • Manage the differing opinions and priorities of 20+ harem members.

  • Invest in over 140 different assets that have an impact on the plot and provide returns as the story progresses (Chapter 1+).

  • Negotiate deals between kingdoms and organizations, shaping the course of nations and religions (Chapter 2+).

  • Upgrade and customize a home base (Chapter 4+).

content_descriptors.notes: The Last Sovereign is about a world in which sex and sexual magic play a major role.

name: The Last Sovereign

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: Pentium III 500mhz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews:
“Honestly, this is one of my favorite adult games. Intelligently written, humorous, and characters with realistic motivations (for their world anyways). ... If you like plot instead of just "plot", then The Last Sovereign is for you.”
quiller

“From the world building, to the dialog, to the characters, I’ve really gotten into this game a lot. The sexuality is handled with what can only be described as a frightening amount of maturity. I love the fact that as important as sex is in this game and world, that the game doesn't FEEL pornographic. I love the fact that the characters have emotional bonds and reasons for being, even characters like Yarra and Qum. The quality of the writing, and the fact that the game is so much more than a vehicle for sex scenes, really make it a stand out piece. I can't quite gush enough how much I enjoy it, as a game, as porn, but also as overall fiction.”
ksoma

“Holy crap it is outrageously well written. The protagonists are all brilliant: their banter is pitch-perfect and effortlessly endearing. I'm used to finding characters in porn games attractive (that is, after all, the point), but I don't think I've ever grown to like them before. I'm seriously blown away by the characterization. Plus, the plot is actually interesting too! Oh yeah, and the sex is hot.”
Acrolith
short_description: The Last Sovereign is an adult fantasy RPG that twists your expectations for adult games, while fully embracing a reconstruction of some familiar old tropes to provide a lot of fun, sexy content.
